name: rexeqbid
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wb(wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c1, w2)))

comment: Equality deduction for restricted existential quantifier. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Mar-2017.)
